ARABIC: وَيَٰقَوْمِ مَن يَنصُرُنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِن طَرَدتُّهُمْ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: My people! Who would help me against Allah if I did drive them away? So will you not pay heed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O my people, who will save me from God if I drive them away? Do you not understand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: My people! Were I to drive the men of faith away, who will protect me from (the chastisement of) Allah? Do you not understand even this much?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: My people, who would protect me against God if I were to drive these people away? Will you then not take heed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And O my people! Who would rescue me from Allah if I repel them? So do you not think?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And O my people! Who will help me against Allah, if I drove them away Will you not then give a thought
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And, O my people! who will help me against Allah if I drive them away? Will you not then mind?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O my people, who would help me against God, if I drive you away?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And, O my people! who would deliver me from Allah if I thrust them away? Will ye not then reflect?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: My people, who would support  me against God if I were to drive them off? Will you not take heed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O My people! who will succour me against Allah, if I drave them away! Admonished are ye not then?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O my people! Who would come to my help against Allah were I to drive them away? Will you not then take admonition?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And O my people! who would help me against Allah if I drove them away? Will ye not then take heed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And O my people! Who will help me against Allah, if I drove them away? Will you not then give a thought?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Were I to drive you away my nation, who would help me from Allah? Will you not remember?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “O my people! Who will support me against God, if I dismiss them? Will you not give a thought?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And O my people, who would protect me from Allah if I drove them away? Then will you not be reminded?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [11:30] And O my people, who would help, [who would] defend, me against God, that is, [against] His chastisement, if I drive them away?, in other words, there is none to help me. Will you not then remember? (tadhakkarūn: the original second tā’ [in tatadhakkarūn] has been assimilated with the dhāl), [will you not then] be admonished?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And, my people! who would deliver me) who would save me (from Allah) from Allah's chastisement (if I thrust them away) due to what you say? (Will ye not then reflect) will you not be admonished by what I say and hence believe?
